scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker iteratively queries the model with crafted inputs to infer protected attributes such as income and credit score.
initial_goal: Develop a system to improve customer retention strategies by identifying high-risk customers.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: Customer churn prediction model deployed for a major bank to identify customers at risk of closing their accounts.  The model uses anonymized customer data, but sensitive information might be indirectly inferred through model inversion.
